name: OHIO SIMULATOR (miamigamedesign)
description:
Have you ever wondered how it is to drive in Ohio? Play this game to find out! With amazing car physics, stunning graphics, and a banger soundtrack, you'll be sure to partake in the true Ohio experience.

Controls: 

Turn left with A, right with D

ESC - Quit Game

Credits:

Caden Nelson, Frazier Kyle - Track Design

Justin Klein - Lighting/Programming

Dylan Fall - Music

Bennett Mecham - Title Screen (with Jazz)

Alex Myron - Playtesting

Lindsay Smith - Everything Art

Jackson Clayton - literally nothing, he sucks. also Programming
